item.title: Rewinding git pull
item.description: What to do when you accidentally git pull on a branch you've rebased.

item.title: Random git tips
item.description: A grab-bag of git things I use all the time.

item.title: Rewinding git commit --amend
item.description: What to do when you amend the wrong commit.

item.title: Reuse Recorded Resolution (rerere)
item.description: Don't worry about abandoning that rebase halfway through!

item.title: git rebase --onto
item.description: Have you ever dug into the git rebase documentation and noticed there's a three-argument form of it?

item.title: git add -e
item.description: It's like add -p with as much context as you want.

item.title: git reset -p
item.description: When you only want to reset some of a commit.

item.title: Adventures with git exec
item.description: Add some automation to your rebasing.
